metadata.title: WebPro English Translation
metadata.summary: WebPro's primary English translation. Unfortunately, as WebPro isn't fully translatable, it does fall short. WebPro 4.0 will be fully translatable.

languagePack.phrases:
The Archives: Select a Room Forum BBCode HTML Message Time User Here you can find and search through every post made. Simply enter a room, time frame, and the number of results to show and we can get started: This room has no messages. Number of Results Per Page: Page: Oldest First: Room: View Archive The Archives User IDs (Optional): Results Format: images/favicon.png blue FreezeMessenger Beta 3 (DEV BUILD) You see... our incredibly high standards of admittance, or perhaps just our unjust bias, has resulted in us unfairly denying you access to this probably-not-worth-your time room. We do apologize for being such snobs... but yet, we still are. So, we must now ask you to leave. You are not a part of this group, rather you are only granted access because you are an administrator. Please respect user privacy: do not post in this group unwanted, and moreover do not spy without due reason. We're sorry, but for the time being you have been banned from the chat. You may contact an administrator for more information. We're Sorry2 This room is not an official room, and as such is not actively moderated. Please excercise caution when talking to people you do not know, and do not reveal personal information. This room is a private room between you and another individual, and is not accessible to any other user or administrator. If you would like to ignore this person right click their userName and choose "Ignore". After hours of intense computation, we have failed to locate the room you selected. Copyright License Thanks You have been banned from creating rooms. Your group was successfully created at: Room creation has been disabled. Reset Create Room Unknown Action A list of groups who can view the room. Currently Allowed Groups: Allowed Groups A list of users who can view the room. Currently Allowed Users: Allowed Users Enable Censors Go There! This room is deleted, and as such may not be edited. A list of moderators who can delete posts from your group, kick users, and so-fourth. Current Moderators: Moderators Your group's name. Name The name for your group is already taken. You did not specify a name. You must be the owner to edit a room. Reset Edit Room Unsuccessful Login Guest Links Hello. Please Enter Your Login Credentials Below: You appeared to have entered a wrong password. Remeber, passwords are case sensitive. No user exists with that user title. Is it possible that you have changed your name recently? Password: Remember Me for One Week?: Reset Launch Login to FreezeMessenger Username: Loading... Room Username If checked, a "ding" will sound whenever a new message is received and you aren't there to see it. Enable Audio Ding: Here's a Preview! This changes what room defaults when you first visit FreezeMessenger Default Room: This changes the volume of the audio ding played when a new message is received. Audio Volume: This will disable default formatting some users use on their messages. Disable Formatting: Disabling effects can lead to a performance and a reduction of "client-side" lag (that not related to the server). It has no side-effects, aside from not looking as pretty. Disable Effects: This will disable right click functionality, replaced with a click menu placed to the right of the item. It is experimental, and will have some issues. Disable Right Click: This will disable image embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a link or alternate text. Disable Images: This will disable video embeds in rooms that allow them, replaced with a "click to activate" link. Disable Video Embeds: Enable Webkit Notifications: Attempts to request permission to enable Webkit notifications, which are used by Google Chrome to notify you of new private messages even when you are not currently in a FreezeMessenger tab. Users included here will be unable to contact you using private messaging. Current Users Ignored Users Add By default parental controls are enabled that help keep younger users safe. Check this to disable these features, however we take no responsibility for any reprecussions. Disable Parental Controls: This will show newer posts at the bottom instead of the top, as is common with many instant messenging programs. Show Old Posts First: Showing avatars will reduce the overall amount of text by hiding post times and userNames with a small avatar to represent users. Times can be viewed by moving the mouse over each message. Show Avatars: Change the theming of the messenger to your liking. "Cupertino" and "jQueryUI" are good choices. Theme: Cupertino jQueryUI Darkness jQueryUI Lightness Darkhive Start Vader Trontastic Humanity MemeticaLly Pink Font Size: This changes the messenger's all-around font-size. Some things may become slightly distored at different extremes. Tiny Very Small Small Medium Large Very Large Huge These rooms will be monitored for new posts, similar to Private IMs. Current Rooms: Watch Rooms: Add Chat Display Advanced Message Formatting General Default Formatting: Bold Italics Choose Settings Reset Go Number of Results: # Room List (IDs): Who's Online Online AdminCP Ban a User Modify Censor Modify Hooks Moderate Images Maintenance Modify Branding Moderate Admins Modify Templates Unban a User Moderate Users See All Copyrights Message Archive Change Settings Community Copyright Create a Room Edit Room Kick a User Loading... Login Logout Manage kicked Users Moderation Enter Private IM Key Room List Rooms Show Fewer Show More View Stats Unkick a User Me View My Uploads That image is not of a valid type. Could not obtain file contents. Could not upload the file for unknown reasons. Unknown upload method. That image does not exist or refuses to load. You did not specify a URL. The URL does not appear to be a Youtube video. Other Error: The file you are trying to upload is too large. Actions Mime Type Name Preview Size Upload from Computer Preview & Submit Upload Upload New File 10+ (E10+/PG) 13+ (T/PG-13) 16+ (M/R) 18+ (AO/NC-17) 6+ (E/G) Intro Rules Help Reqs FAQs FreezeMessenger 3.0 (FIM, FIM3, or FIMv3) is an advanced AJAX-based online webmessenger and Instant Messenger substitute created to allow anybody to easily communicate with anybody else all across the web. It is highly sophisticated, supporting all modern browsers and utilizing various cutting-edge features in each. It was written from scratch by Joseph T. Parsons ("FreezeWarp") with PHP, MySQL, and other tricks along the way. In no part of the chat, whether it be in a public, private, official, or nonofficial room, are you allowed to:
  • Promote or inflict hatespeech.
  • Post, link to, or encourage illegal material.
  • Encourage or enable another member to do any of the above.
[WIP] FIM's WebPro Interface will work decently with any of the following browsers:
  • Google Chrome / Chromium (Latest) [RECOMMENDED]
  • Firefox (Latest) [RECOMMENDED]
  • Opera 11+
  • Safari 5+
  • Internet Explorer 8+


Some features are currently not available for all browsers, however:
  • Internet Explorer does not support file uploads or server sent events (the latter which allows for near-instant communication on enabled servers).
  • Firefox versions 5 and lower do not support server sent events.
  • Opera may not support file uploads.
  • Where Do I Report Bugs? - Bugs can be reported to the Google Code bugtracker.
  • Can I Donate to this Awesome Project? - Please do. It really helps keep development going.
My Kicks
